name: Structural Steel
short_description: Hot rolled structural sections including beams, channels, and angles for load-bearing fabrication.
meta_description: Structural steel beams, channels, and angles per IS 2062 / EN 10025. Shot blasted, primed options with MTC. Get quotes from Shriram Steels.
sizes: Equal Angle 65 x 65 x 6 mm x 6m
features: High load-bearing capacity with consistent straightness
Shot blasted and primed options for faster fabrication
Ultrasonic tested heats with traceable mill certificates
Tight dimensional tolerances for reliable assembly

specifications.certification: Material Test Reports with heat numbers

applications: Cranes, gantries, and material handling structures
Machine base frames and fabrication projects
